description:
The maximum size of video-clip files supported in a Pro account is 200MB and that in Premium is 75MB.


A video file of format .mp4, .avi and .vlc is supported by this application.
title: What is the valid file size and format of video-clip files supported by this application?
description_text: The maximum size of video-clip files supported in a Pro account is 200MB and that in Premium is 75MB.     A video file of format .mp4, .avi and .vlc is supported by this application.

description: The length limit depends on the plan chosen. For pro subscription, it is restricted to 60 seconds and for premium, to 30 seconds.
title: What is the length limit of video file that can be added?
description_text: The length limit depends on the plan chosen. For pro subscription, it is restricted to 60 seconds and for premium, to 30 seconds.

description: The video clip feature is available on the paid plans of Picovico. If you are using a free plan, consider upgrading!
title: Why can't I add video clips to my slideshow?
description_text: The video clip feature is available on the paid plans of Picovico. If you are using a free plan, consider upgrading!

description: You can add a CTA through the media player page. On the 'Video Settings' menu, under 'Info & details', you can see the space to add your CTA button text and URL.
title: How to add a CTA button?
description_text: You can add a CTA through the media player page. On the 'Video Settings' menu, under 'Info & details', you can see the space to add your CTA button text and URL.
